title: feat: prettify app descriptions with markdown
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Markdown makeover
gist.blurb: App descriptions just got a glow-up! We're now using our own text API to rewrite them into zine-style markdown with bold text and lists.
gist.summary: Implements automatic markdown formatting for app descriptions using the Pollinations text API and adds a new Pixel Art UI theme.
gist.impact: Users will experience richer, easier-to-read app descriptions and can now select a cozy new pixel art interface theme.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot acting as an editor, upgrading plain text into fancy formatted text. Since a pixel art theme was added, the scene should be explicitly meta-pixel-art.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a large pixelated quill, editing a floating holographic text panel. The text on the panel is transforming from plain gray lines into colorful bold headers and bullet points. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'MARKDOWN'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
